scene_target: Artie spawns into the Whispering Woods and realizes that a 1 HP build makes even the tutorial zone a death trap.
goal: Demonstrate the immediate, lethal consequences of Artie's glitched 1 HP build.
conflict: Artie must navigate basic terrain and a low-level mob without taking a single point of damage.
end_condition: Artie is cornered by a Level 1 Slime, realizing he cannot survive even a glancing blow.

last_scene: Artie Penhaligon arrived in the Whispering Woods tutorial zone with his glitched 1 HP build.
He was immediately targeted by a Level 1 Slime and realized that even the weakest enemies are lethal to him.
Artie was cornered in a dead-end crevice as the slime launched a final attack.
key_events: Artie spawns into the Whispering Woods and confirms his 1 HP status.
Fizz explains that Artie's build requires him to avoid all damage entirely.
A Level 1 Lesser Puddle Slime attacks, demonstrating a damage floor higher than Artie's max HP.
Artie flees into a rocky crevice, which turns out to be a dead end.
The System locks the combat state as the slime prepares to finish Artie off.
